name: Youtube Material Design (not blue) ^_""
description:
Still a work in progress!!

Red header, paper cards Roboto font...  what else could you ask for?  it's material design!

!!Install the font Roboto from Google for best results!!
Material design is owned by google, same for youtube!  Gooer get on it and make the websites look like Web 5.0 for Gaben's sake!
additional_info:
update 1 :
- loads of changes
- revert of changes on the feed pages.
- unified (almost) .yt.card box-shadows.
- retint of the top bar to match even more the official colors.
- new thumbnail time display (BETA)
- header icons are now white insetad of dark red.

discussions.name: Love the looks, but doesn't work! :-(
